NGUS NAS MCHI MA BLAGS TE MCHOD PA BYAS SO, ,DE NAS STOBS PO CHE
RNAMS 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA SHIN TU DUS

NAS RIN PO CHE SNA BDUN GYI SENG GE'I KHRI BRGYAD PO BTEG STE
SPOS KYI BDAG GUS BSKUS PA'I LAM THOG THAG TU RTZVA MCHOG GI
GRONG KHYER DU GSHEGS SO, ,DE NAS LHA DANG, MI DANG 'KHOR

NAS GRONG KHYER GYI NANG DU LAM GYI GZHI MDOR BZHAG GO ,DE'I TSE

GRVA BZHIR MCHOD PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DU BTZUGS SO, ,DE NAS GRONG
